name: The Banner Saga

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/The Banner Saga/win32/The Banner Saga.exe

files.setup: N/A:Select the Windows installer provided by GOG

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the Windows installer provided by GOG
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/The Banner Saga/win32/The Banner Saga.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOCANCEL
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
